data.text: @hartx2 Hi Collette! Our records indicate that a member of our team has reached out to you via DM. - C

@MichaelNguyen02 Hi Michael! Thanks for reaching out with this question. That will be accepted as your one free personal item, only if it is within the dimensions of 7 x 15 x 16 inches. If it's larger than that with the  handle, it will be considered a Carry-On with the applicable fee. - C

data.text: @b_i_g_m_a_n_ Hi there! We're very sorry to hear of the disruption in your travel. For assistance, please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address on file and the nature of your inquiry. A member of our team would be happy to review. -JH

@lindsey74461667 While social distancing is top-of-mind for many, it's not always possible onboard an aircraft. For this reason, customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if their flight exceeds 65% capacity. -JH
@Luke60T Hey Luke! We're so sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
@TerryLinhart Our apologies for any inconvenience and thank you for your patience, Terry. Please feel free to send us a DM, if in need of assistance. -JH
@Jaborison Hi Jacob! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@KSUFBOPS Awesome Jay, we'll see you soon! #TogertherWeFly -JH

@sirFLYiv Hi there! We do have agents working from, we are so sorry to hear your are experiencing a longer than normal hold time. If you need assistance that does not require a payment, please let us know. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@WhidbeyTom428 Hi Thomas, please send over a direct message if you're in need of any assistance. -Nicole

https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC
@KandiSamples Hi Kandi! As long as the pet carrier does not exceed 9x16x19 or can be squished down to fit all while the pet is comfortable, that would be acceptable. - GM
@Y0TELEX Hi! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM. Also, make sure that you are not contacting a third-party company and only reach out to Allegiant at 702-505-8888. -JH
@coltspapa Hi Bob. Depending on day the flight times seem to be different. But we only have one flight a day. - GM

@unrollFN Hi there! You are welcome to bring your skateboard but it must be checked in and must be in a container or case, and is subject to standard checked bag fees. For more information, please visit https://t.co/ix9aEYkOxx. -Nicole

Your family is our family when you travel with us. And family always comes first. That's why we're Going the Distance for your health and safety every day. #TogetherWeFly #WorldHealthDay https://t.co/pvzl2kMnWb

urls.title: Purchase Cheap Airline Tickets at the Airport | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Last-minute travel plans? You have the option to purchase cheap airline tickets at the airport. Please note the ticket counter hours of operation.

urls.description: Be the first to know about Allegiant's sale fares, special offers, new route announcements and schedule extensions! Sign up today and start saving!
